Cell.Data: Fall Season: Home Decorating and Design
Visit HGTV.com to find the best fall decorating ideas and interior design tips, plus color schemes and fall centerpieces.

div.h2: This fall, it’s all about cozy decorating ideas. Add warmth to your home’s decor with new wall colors, learn about the latest in fall design trends and discover easy ways to turn your home into a welcoming haven.

div.p: Tastemakers dish details on fall home colors, patterns that will make your walls and upholstery pop, and easy fall decorating tricks.
Learn how to make tablescapes, mantel decorations, seasonal window boxes and tablescapes with help from a design pro.
Harvest Window Box, Pumpkin and Gourd Centerpiece, Fireplace Decorations and More How-To Decorating Videos
Go cozy or dial up the drama with our best seasonal decorating ideas — for the front yard, indoor spaces and tabletops.
18 Ideas From Designers and Home Decorators, Budget-Friendly Room Makeovers and Home Staging Techniques for Fall
Don't be shy! It's easier than you think to infuse rooms with warm, welcoming fall colors. Follow these tips from design pros.
Rich Wall and Furnishing Colors, 20 Colorful Bedrooms, 3 Steps to the Perfect Room Palette and More Home Color Ideas

li.p: Spruce up every room and prepare your home for winter.
Boost curb appeal, create an outdoor room or focus on fall planting.

div.p: from:
Tell us what you need, and we'll help you find the best service providers in your area.

Cell.Data: Home Decorating, Interior Design Color Schemes, Fall Decorating Ideas, Fall Decorating Pictures, Home Staging
Fall Decorating Ideas and Pictures: Interior Design Tips, Room Colors, Fall Centerpieces, & More
Whether you plan to winterize your home, tackle weekend home improvement projects, decorate for fall or prepare to buy or sell a home, you?ll find expert tips at HGTV.com.

div.h2: Feather your nest this fall with our best cozy decorating ideas and interior design tips, plus winterization techniques and landscaping ideas that will boost your home’s curb appeal.

img.alt: The Best Small Trees for Fall

div.p: Plant a container garden, add oomph to your front landscape or focus on fall-flowering plants, shrubs and small trees. Fall's the time to evaluate your yard and add color where it's needed most.
Reinvent your home this fall. We share the hottest home colors for late 2011, the coolest wall and fabric patterns, and trendy decorating techniques that will make every room sparkle.

p.a: Most Popular Wall and Fabric Patterns

div.p: Discover ways to beautify your home — before holiday quests arrive. Take your pick of projects, from easy DIY window treatments to quick and easy home fixes and remodeling tricks.
Simple and sensational: Add warmth to your decor with these indoor and outdoor tricks.
Prepare your yard for a gorgeous spring season.
Give your bathroom a makeover with these quick and easy tricks.
from:
Tell us what you need, and we'll help you find the best service providers in your area.

The Hot New Standard in Green Living
Enter twice per day — once on HGTV.com and once on FrontDoor.com — for your chance to win HGTV Green Home 2011, a custom-built, fully furnished, eco-fabulous home situated in Stapleton, Denver's premier sustainable community. The grand-prize package — worth almost $700,000 — also includes local artwork, beautiful furnishings, engineered hardwood flooring and a new 2011 GMC Terrain and $100,000. Remember, you can enter twice a day through June 2, 2011, for your chance to win.

//US Phone Number Validation Method for jQuery validation $.validator.addMethod("phoneUS", function(phone_number, element) { phone_number = phone_number.replace(/\\s+/g, ""); return this.optional(element) || phone_number.length > 9 && phone_number.match(/^(1-?)?(\\([2-9]\\d{2}\\)|[2-9]\\d{2})-?[2-9]\\d{2}-?\\d{4}$/); }, "Please specify a valid phone number");
//US Zip Code Validation Method for jQuery validation $.validator.addMethod("zipUS", function(zip_code, element) { zip_code = zip_code.replace(/\\s+/g, ""); return this.optional(element) || zip_code.length > 4 && zip_code.match(/^\\d{5}(-\\d{4})?$/); }, "Please specify a valid zip code");
//US Phone Number Validation Method for jQuery validation /*$.validator.addMethod("phoneUS", function(phone_number, element) { phone_number = phone_number.replace(/\s+/g, ""); return this.optional(element) || phone_number.length > 9 && phone_number.match(/^(1-?)?(\([2-9]\d{2}\)|[2-9]\d{2})-?[2-9]\d{2}-?\d{4}$/); }, "Please specify a valid phone number");
//US Zip Code Validation Method for jQuery validation $.validator.addMethod("zipUS", function(zip_code, element) { zip_code = zip_code.replace(/\s+/g, ""); return this.optional(element) || zip_code.length > 4 && zip_code.match(/^\d{5}(-\d{4})?$/); }, "Please specify a valid zip code");*/
window.onbeforeunload = confirmExit; ftn.sweeps.init("premiere"); })();

Winterize your home, launch a home improvement or remodeling project and spruce up interior spaces with the best repair tips from HGTV.com.

div.p: Wondering which home improvements will give you the best bang for your buck? Before you sink money into repairs, see what realtors, contractors and architects have to say.

li.a: More Home Improvement Dos and Don'ts

div.p: Don't get caught unprepared during the holiday season. Simple home repairs and improvements you make now will pay off when guests ooh and ahh over your comfortable spaces.

p.a: More Ways to Prepare for Houseguests

div.p: Transform the look of your fireplace with a new wooden surround and marble hearth. It's easier than you think.
Don't let Old Man Winter get the better of you! Learn how to weather-strip, weatherproof, seal and waterproof.

Cell.Data: Weekend Home Improvement Projects, DIY Projects, Best Home Improvements to Increase Value of Home, Outdoor Room Design
Fall Home Improvements Ideas and DIY Projects – Home Repairs & Maintenace
Add color to your fall landscape and get the best fall gardening tips with pictures from the gardening experts at HGTV.com.

div.h2: Draw all eyes to your outdoor spaces and gardens this fall. Improve your home’s curb appeal, carve out a cozy outdoor space ideal for fall gatherings or dress up exterior spaces with container gardens.

div.p: In this slower season, take time to focus on colorful container gardens and landscape elements that will beautifully frame your home. We share creative ideas, easy how-tos and expert suggestions.
Give your favorite space a quick and easy makeover with an easy-to-plant container garden. Fill it, move it about and make it work for you.
14 Planter Ideas, Amazing Container Gardens, Trailing Plants for Hanging Baskets and More Potting and Planting Ideas
If your yard is looking a bit humdrum, we have a fast fix: Focus on color with the most dramatic annuals, perennials, shrubs and trees.
Showy and fragrant, these perennials and annuals will add drama to landscape beds and walkways.
Improve your home's curb appeal with landscape, lighting, cladding and painting upgrades.
Fences, flooring and backyard games will make your outdoor living space the place to be on autumn weekends.
Carve Out a Fire Pit Area, Build a Log Table, Make a Corn Hole Set and More Funscaping Ideas
The first frost of the season is fast approaching. Learn what tasks you need to tackle now for a beautiful garden next spring and summer.
Gardening To-Do List and Soil Prepping

li.p: Discover easy ways to turn your home into a welcoming haven.
Spruce up each room and prepare your home for winter.

div.p: from:
Tell us what you need, and we'll help you find the best service providers in your area.

Fall Gardening Ideas and Autumn Landscapes – Pictures of Fall Gardens with Garden Maintenance Tips

div.h2: Feather your nest this fall with our best cozy decorating ideas and interior design tips, plus winterization techniques and landscaping ideas that will boost your home’s curb appeal.

div.p: This season, it’s all about cozy decorating ideas. Add warmth to your home’s decor with new wall colors, discover the latest in fall design trends and discover easy ways to turn your home into a welcoming haven.
Is your home in need of a little TLC? Spruce up interior and exterior spaces with our best home improvement ideas and DIY projects. Plus, prepare for old man winter with home winterization tricks.
Draw all eyes to your outdoor spaces this fall. Improve your home’s curb appeal, carve out a cozy outdoor space ideal for fall gatherings or dress up exterior spaces with seasonal container gardens.
Surround yourself with warm wall colors, soft fabrics and cozy floor coverings.

div.h2: This fall, it’s all about cozy decorating ideas. Add warmth to your home’s decor with new wall colors, learn about the latest in fall design trends and discover easy ways to turn your home into a welcoming haven.

div.p: As the weather turns chilly, spice up your home interiors. Add warmth and coziness with fall-chic color combos and decorator fabrics.

Cell.Data: Start your holiday shopping here! Find homemade Christmas gift ideas, ornaments, crafts, as well as creative Christmas gift suggestions at HGTV.com.

div.h2: Shopping for friends and family? Or searching for DIY gift ideas? Our gift guides offer up product picks for every personality type, plus easy Christmas crafts to try.

div.p: Sure, you can order presents online. But isn't a handcrafted Christmas gift worth its weight in gold? Try some of these crafty ideas for friends, neighbors and family.
Say thanks to the party planner or welcome a new neighborh with a thoughtful gift that shows you care.
Whether you are shopping for a white elephant party, the kids or extended family, you will find the perfect Christmas gift for every person on your list.
